title: Quickest way to improve skills (Haven't played since '14)
body:
Just trying to get the update on the most recent champions and playtype differences seeing as I haven't played since 2014.

Need to get back into the hang of things and haven't got a clue on what's changed.

~~Help me out boiz~~

replies.body:
playing a lot is both the quickest and longest way to improve (though setting goals is more efficient so you know where to improve)

"Practice does not make perfect. Only perfect practice makes perfect." *had to slip that one in*

Well, there's a lot of stuff that's changed, best way to get a feel for it would be to just play a bit! If you want the quickest way to improve your skills, try watching some videos for areas you feel you are weak in, or simply re-watch your games and try to identify mistakes/things you could improve on :)
Read ALL the Patch notes. Practice ALL the champs you have in bots. Also watch a lot of league vids. There you go
